naslov: Luksuzni resort prvi red uz more - Stanići !!! (prodaja)
opis: Posredujemo u prodaji Laurentis Resorta, zaista nesvakidašnjeg dragulja u šarmantnom mjestu Stanići, samo 25 km južno od Splita i 5 km južno od Omiša. Ove ville smještene su na strmoj padini uz prekrasnu plažu i s kojih se pruža pogled koji oduzima dah! Sa svojom lokacijom bez premca, Laurentis Resort nudi jedinstveno životno iskustvo. Rasprostranjena na 600m2 zemljišta, ova izvrsna nekretnina također uključuje dodatnih 50m2 odvojenog zemljišta, zajedno s tri prikladna parkirna mjesta (dva otvorena i jedno podzemno). Resort se sastoji od dvije glavne zgrade: Villa Laurina i Olivia House. Villa Laurina smještena je na vrhu litice, tik uz plažu. To je mala vila na plaži površine 50m2 na dvije etaže. Na donjoj etaži nalazi se kuhinja, dok je na gornjoj spavaća soba s kupaonicom, wc-om i garderobom. Ovaj pansion se može pohvaliti vlastitim bazenom, platformom za sunčanje, prostorom za roštilj i dva mala spremišta. Osim toga, na vrhu bazena nalazi se mala galerija koja pruža ugodno mjesto za sjedenje i opuštanje. Kuća Olivia nalazi se na vrhu zemljišta i prostire se na površini od 250m2 raspoređenoj na četiri etaže. Ova zgrada se sastoji od dva odvojena stana, svaki na dvije etaže i do kojih se dolazi unutarnjim i vanjskim stepenicama. Nedavno renovirani donji apartman uključuje kuhinju, blagovaonicu i dnevni boravak, WC, praonicu i vanjski prostor za roštilj. Na drugoj etaži donjeg apartmana nalaze se dvije spavaće sobe i dvije kupaonice. Gornji apartman sadrži kuhinju, blagovaonicu i dnevni boravak, wc, te prostranu terasu ispred stambenog prostora. Gornji kat kuće Olivia obuhvaća dvije spavaće sobe, kupaonicu i terasu. Uz kuću Olivia nalazi se neizgrađeno zemljište koje nudi mogućnost gradnje još jedne kuće sa zajedničkim zidom ili proširenja postojeće kuće. Detalji *Odmarališta Laurentis:* Zemljište: 600m2 (pod objektima) + 50m2 (parking) Kuća Olivia: 2 apartmana, svaki na 2 etaže Donji stan: 85m2 + terasa 15m2, prostor za Gornji stan: 90m2 + 35m2 terase Villa Laurina: 2 etaže, 50m2 Bazen: 5×3m Sunčana platforma: 20m2 Površina oko bazena: 25m2 Galerija: 6m2 Površina roštilja: 12m2 3 parkirna mjesta (2 otvorena, 1 podzemno) Ukupna cijena za Laurentis Resort je 1.200.000 eura. KONTAKT: 0915615115 (ŽELJANA) We are mediating the sale of Laurentis Resort, a truly unusual gem in the charming town of Stanići, just 25 km south of Split and 5 km south of Omiš. The resort is located on a steep slope next to a beautiful beach with a wonderful view. With its unrivaled location, Laurentis Resort offers a unique living experience. Spread over 600m2 of land, this excellent property also includes an additional 50m2 of detached land, together with three convenient parking spaces (two open and one underground). The resort consists of two main buildings: Villa Laurina and Olivia House. Villa Laurina is located on top of a cliff, right next to the beach. It is a small villa on the beach with an area of ​​50m2 on two floors. On the lower floor there is a kitchen, while on the upper floor there is a bedroom with a bathroom, toilet and wardrobe. This guesthouse boasts its own swimming pool, sunbathing platform, barbecue area and two small storage rooms. In addition, there is a small gallery at the top of the pool that provides a pleasant place to sit and relax. House Olivia is located at the top of the land and covers an area of ​​250m2 spread over four floors. This building consists of two separate apartments, each on two floors and accessible by internal and external stairs. The recently renovated lower apartment includes a kitchen, dining and living room, toilet, laundry room and outdoor barbecue area. On the second floor of the lower apartment there are two bedrooms and two bathrooms. The upper apartment contains a kitchen, dining room and living room, toilet, and a spacious terrace in front of the living space. The upper floor of the Olivia house includes two bedrooms, a bathroom and a terrace. Next to the Olivia house there is undeveloped land that offers the possibility of building another house with a common wall or expanding the existing house. Details of *Laurentis Resorts:* Land: 600m2 (under buildings) + 50m2 (parking) House Olivia: 2 apartments, each on 2 floors Lower apartment: 85m2 + terrace 15m2, barbecue area Top apartment: 90m2 + 35m2 terrace Villa Laurina: 2 floors, 50m2 Swimming pool: 5×3m Sun platform: 20m2 Area around the pool: 25m2 Gallery: 6m2 Grill area: 12m2 3 parking spaces (2 open, 1 underground) The total price for Laurentis Resort is 1,200,000 euros. CONTACT: 0915615115 (ZELJANA)
Grijanje: Sustav grijanja: Sustav grijanja, klimatizacije i ventilacije
naziv_agencije: Studio Aura j.d.o.o. Agencija za nekretnine i consulting
